item.title: 38 cray road sidcup DA14 5BZ tree causing an obstruction., 25th January
item.description:
38 cray road sudcup DA14 5BZ property tree, the several branches from the tree and ivy are extending over my property 36 cray road sidcup DA14 5BZ, and these branches have become entangled with ivy hights and interfering with emergency access. The persistent growth is dangerous and may cause higher cost.
